text: Showed the sommely video to some beer nerd friends. They all want to know when and how much
at IDF, many discussions about beer and whiskey applications. :slightly_smiling_face:
There were quite a few people who wanted something for their beer cellars. Didn't know such a thing existed. Quite a few people recommended touring Napa valley with a sommely road show

One guy from Burma brought up the topic of wine forgery in south east asia. It would be neat to have wineries register each bottle/case/barrel to the block chain via sommely. With full history of temperature, humidity, and barometric pressure.
Probably should have added that to the patent
food transparency is a big deal - Jeff is always excitedly chatting about it.
Intel was demoing a micro controller that had wireless energy harvesting
It's called Jasmine and it's still in prototype phase. They had a board with multiple sensors and Bluetooth wirelessly charging via a super capacitor
And it was smaller than our LED board
